titles: The true history of councils enlarged and defended against the deceits of a pretended vindicator of the primitive church, but indeed of the tympanite & tyranny of some prelates many hundred years after Christ, with a detection of the false history of Edward Lord Bishop of Corke and Rosse in Ireland ... and a preface abbreviating much of Ludolphus's History of Habassta : written to shew their dangerous errour, who think that a general council, or colledge of bishops, is a supream governour of all the Christian world ... / by Richard Baxter ... ; to which is added by another hand, a defence of a book, entituled, No evidence for diocesan churches ...
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Maurice, Henry, 1648-1691. --  Vindication of the primitive church.
Clarkson, David, 1622-1686. --  No evidence for diocesan churches.
Church of England --  Government --  Controversial literature.
